name: Cat Hammock for Cage, Soft Warm Hanging Bed for Kitten, Guinea Pig, Ferret, Rat, Chinchilla and Other Small Pets, Cozy Bunkbed 13.39"x13.39", Love Coffee Pattern
short_description: Premium Soft Materials Made of thick coral fleece and arctic fleece, this hammock is soft, cozy, and warm, creating a secure resting place for small pets. Durable metal hooks ensure safe and stable hanging inside the cage.

Double-Layer Design Unique two-tier structure allows pets to rest on the upper level and play or hide underneath. Maximizes cage space while providing both comfort and entertainment for your furry friends.

Fits Various Small Pets Measuring 13.39"x13.39", this hammock is spacious and comfortable for kittens, guinea pigs, ferrets, chinchillas, squirrels, hamsters, and other small pets. Cute patterns add extra fun to their habitat.
Easy Installation & Cleaning Comes with 4 sturdy metal hooks for quick attachment to cages or crates. The fabric is hand-washable, making it easy to keep clean and hygienic for everyday pet use.

Enhances Pet Comfort & Happiness More than just a hammock, it’s a cozy home for small animals. Suitable for indoor, outdoor, cage use, or even under chairs, offering warmth, safety, and relaxation anytime.

name: GOMIBABY Pack of 2 Hanging Corner Hammock with Hooks for Ferrets, Rats, Guinea Pigs, Chinchillas, Hamsters, Hedgehogs, and Other Small Animals., Medium, Coffee+Purple
short_description: 【Super soft velvet fabric】 It makes the mouse hammock so comfortable that no rodent can withstand a nap.
【Corner hammock extension】 Give them this corner hammock and you will not only buy the playing surfaces, but also create a brand new one!
【Double Sided Cute Patterns】 All our wild ferrets/guinea pigs hammocks are double sided- one side is decorative and the other side is sturdy.
【Comes with hooks】Easily installed in any cage with a right angle and a place to hang hooks (included). You can adjust the height of the hammock to accommodate your pet.
Size for all small animals: S - for rats, mice, hamsters, small guinea pigs. M - for guinea pig, fur, hedgehog. L - for poppy kittens.
product_description: Made with snuggly fleece and flannel, this rat hammock is a fun and cozy addition to your pets’ cage to meet their cuddling needs! With hooks to adjust the hanging height, they are both perfect for experienced climbers and those just getting started. Rodents love to play, sleep, and eat on these. Your pet will enjoy resting on or hiding under this comfy and attractive addition to your cage. Our corner hammock is made with two layers of fleece, with decorative pattern on one side, and solid gray color on the other. Size Chart: (Please note that all the triangles are Right Isosceles Triangles) S -11"x 11"x 16"(28x28x39cm), for rats, mice, hamsters, small guinea pigs. M -16"x 16"x 22"(38x38x54cm), for guinea pigs, chinchillas, hedgehogs. L -17.7"x 17.7"x 25"(45x45x63cm), for ferrets, kittens. Care Instructions: Hand wash, or wash on gentle cycle with cold water. Hang dry.

name: Paw Inspired Hanging Fleece Hammock for Ferrets, Rats, Chinchillas, Sugar Gliders, Small Pets | Hideout Toy for Guinea Pigs, Hamsters | Swivel Clips for Small Animal Cages (Gray/Pink)
short_description: STRONG METAL SWIVEL CLIPS: The 360° rotating metal hooks make this hanging fleece hammock easy to attach to any cage with bars or grids and keep this pet accessory safe and secure in your pet’s habitat.
SOFT & COMFY: Made from a velvet fleece, this plush hammock is a comfortable space for small animals like ferrets, rats, or other small pets to snuggle up and sleep.

VERSATILE: This large hammock measures an impressive 27 by 16.5 inches! Add another level to your small animal’s cage. Not only is it a comfy place to rest and relax, other small animals like chinchillas, guinea pigs, and bunny rabbits can also play underneath as a hidey or simply enjoy it as an enrichment toy.

MACHINE-WASHABLE AND EASY TO CLEAN: Made with our signature Sweep-EZ non-stick velvet fleece, messes like poop, hay, bedding, fur, or other dirt and litter can easily be brushed or swept off. When it gets dirty, you can simply swipe off any debris and throw it in the washing machine, or hand-wash for a more gentle clean.
STYLISH: The reversible hammock comes with a gray side and a pop of color on the other side, currently available in pink, blue, and green, so you can choose what best fits your cage decor.

Directions Laundry Cleaning : 1. Initial Clean : Spot clean first (methods above). ; 2. Wash : Add laundry detergent. Machine wash on regular cycle in cold water. DO NOT use fabric softner. ; 3. Air Dry : Hang until dry., Spot Cleaning : Method 1 - Broom and Dustpan : Use a broom and dustpan to spot clean the surface. Repeat once or twice daily. ; Method 2 - Garbage Can : Fold over the garbage can and shake to discard the unwanted poop and debris. Repeat once or twice daily.

name: ISMARTEN Small Animal Hanging Hammock, Pet Hanging Nap Sack Sleep Bag Bed, Cage Hammock Beds for Ferret Guinea-Pig Sugar Glider Hamster Rat Mice Chinchilla Flying Gerbil and Squirrel
short_description: ❤ NAP SACK SMALL PET HAMMOCK — Made of cozy, soft and superb quality coral fleece, it’ll provide a secure and super comfy resting spot for your lovely one, offers unmatch warmth and comfort.

❤ MULTIPLE WAYS TO USE — Two sided pouch design, critters could snuggle in it and feel safe. You can either hang it as a hammock with Level or Vertical, or simply place inside the cage that can serve as nap sacks. MULTIPLE WAYS TO USE
❤ EASY TO INSTALL AND WASH — Easy and quickly attaches to cage interiors with included 4 metal hooks. and easy to wash as well, washable in washing machine(Please remove the hook before cleaning).

❤ SIZE: Length x Width — 13.4 x 14.2 inch(34 x 36 cm), fit for Ferrets, Guinea Pig , Hamster ,Chinchilla, Rats,Mice, Parrot, Bunnies, Flying Squirrel, Sugar glider , Hedgehog , Berbil , Degu ,and other small pet animals. Max.load support up to 3lbs. Pls check the size before you buy it.

❤ BEST GIFT FOR YOUR LOVELY PET — The double layer hammock can also used as a sleeping pouch. It helps to encourage some shy friends that are hesitant to use hammocks due to their exposed nature. The built in pocket allows them to feel the comfort of snuggling in suspension while still have the security under soft fleece. Great gift for Halloween, Christmas day,New Year, You pet will love it.
product_description: Description Why small animal need a 2-Tiered Honeycomb Hammock? Hammocks are designed to be suspended from the cage, forming a “dimple” that the ferret curls up in. And hanging hammocks are great because they add more usable space to a cage. They also can be strategically hung to provide “steps” to a higher level and prevent long falls in a multistory cage. The deign of this double layer hammock allow the ferret to either sleep on the outside or tunnel into the interior of the hammock. These sleep sack–hammock combinations are quite versatile. Made of of cozy, soft and superb quality coral fleece, it is super soft and comfortable, offering your pet a comfortable and cozy home. Suitable for small pet, like Hamster, Guinea Pig, Chinchilla, Ferrets, Parrot, Bunnies, Rats, Mice, Flying Squirrel, Sugar glider, Hedgehog, Berbil, Degu, Parrakeet and other small pet animals. Feature: - Color: As the picture shows - Material: coral fleece - Size: About13.2 x 14.2 Inch - Durable material and safe design - Sturdy metal snap and straps - Cute pattern can bring more fun to your life Package included: 1 x hanging small animal hammock
